name: Blue
ratings: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
comment: I've had this app on my phone for months and it hasn't alerted once! How is that possible when I go to Wal-Mart and run errands at least once a week. I also noticed that no matter how many hours I'm out and about the ONLY time it does its random checks is when I'm home! One day in particular I was in and out of my house a couple of times and I compared the documented checks with my Google maps log and all 4 checks were while I was obviously home! This app is totally useless if NO ONE USES IT!!
developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthApril 5, 2021The app will only alert you if you are within 15 feet for 15 min, walking around a store will more than likely not trip the notification. The checks you are seeing are simply the uplink to the server that records the phones you were near. That way it can notify those devices.

ratings: Rated 1 stars out of five stars

developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthJanuary 22, 2021Thanks for your feedback! We deeply respect your advice, and we will try to combine your feedback with our R&D, in order to provide better products.

name: Mike Lerch
ratings: Rated 1 stars out of five stars
comment: Overreaching, evil tracking, just so govt can get you used to "social tracking" & who you intact with Edit 5/2021: thank you for the reply. Establishing a list of recipients to alert requires the app to connect to and extange information from nearby bluetooth devices, running continuously/silently in the background. Monitoring the individuals we interact with in 6ft. It is not anonymous if the app can identify the user to alert them, there is an unique traceable indentifier somewhere
developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthJanuary 26, 2021No, not at all. This app simply uses bluetooth to alert you and those around you if have been exposed to COVID. This app is not a tracker, or social recorder. It simply alerts you if you have been exposed. If you become positive it would alert people who have been within 6ft of your phone. completely anonymously

name: Jason Nesheim
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: I don't normally rate apps. Just looking through all the reviews and it's a shame that people ignorant to how the app actually works are leaving negative reviews. Download the app. Let it run. If you test positive, record it in the app. If someone else running this app tests positive and records it in the app, you will receive an alert (If you were near that person for more than 15min). Other than that, the app will silently run until something happens. It's not that hard to understand...

name: Ja Kr
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: Great idea in need of more widespread usage. I have no issue having my anonymous data help people I am in proximity with. I have not gotten any alerts, but I tend to not be out and about a lot during the pandemic so I'm probably less susceptible than many.

name: Jake Crystal
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: Simple app. 5 stars because it works but more people need to download. Stop uninstalling because there is not enough people. Install and let it work. Only need to do something if you test positive.
developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthJanuary 26, 2021Thank you for this review!

name: Christian
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: Simple enough to use. The best way to get the most out of this app is to encourage your friends & family to also get the app! It's a community effort.

name: David Struff
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: I like this. It's simple and easy. I wish my state participated in the program (a state next to mine does).

name: Bill Ostrove
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: Happy with this app so far. It was easy to set up. I like that it focuses on privacy (no permissions required, data anonimized, etc) while helping me do my part to keep us all safe.
developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthNovember 25, 2020Bill - Thank you. This App is totally anonymous and collects no personal data. **SMcC DPH App Admin **

name: Tonya Bond
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: So far so good. I like that you are not required to put your personal information in to use the app. Im happy they came up with something to notify you if someone nearby has the coronavirus.
developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthNovember 25, 2020Tonya - Once installed, this is completely Anonymous. I truly hope you never have to use that feature ! **SMcC DPH App Admin **

name: Jordan Lewis
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: The app requires ZERO permissions on your phone. the app doesn't know who you are, and doesn't know where you are. They did a great job at anonymizing your data. again, GPS IS NOT REQUIRED OR ASKED FOR. it's either we install this app or shutdown the country.
developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthNovember 25, 2020Jordan - Thank you. You are absolutely correct! This App is totally anonymous and collects no personal data, including location. **SMcC DPH App Admin **

name: Melissa Pelletier
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: Installed without any issues. I was worried that it might drain the battery but so far, it uses so little it registers as 0% per hour.

name: Sam Cyanide
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: Nice app, like others have said i appreciate that it doesnt require permissions and the privacy model is transparent. Only thing that could make it better is if it was open source.
developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthNovember 30, 2020Sam - Thank you for your support! Unfortunately we can not make it open source. . . But we have made it FREE! Both the Google and Microsoft ENx Teams are actively involved in regular integration changes and updating of this. ** SMcC DPH Admin **

name: ramana vtv
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: All citizens must be alert about covid-19.Most of the citizens are not wearing Masks, not maintaining social distance. Due to these reasons Covid-19 is not reducing among people. This app is very useful to control covid-19 ,because it alerts the peron who d uses this app-- Ramana VTV.
developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthDecember 1, 2020Ramana - This app is configured to help you be aware ! It stores a record if your are within 6 ft. of another installed app for 15 minutes. If anyone on your list is tested positive then you will be alerted. Hopefully this will stay quiet for you !! Thank you for doing your part ! ** SMcC DPH Admin **

name: Michael Lillis
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: Seems like they did a good job to make this as anonymous as possible. no permissions are required by the app, which is really nice.
developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthNovember 26, 2020Michael - This is completely anonymous and your identity is protected. Thank you for participating !! ** SMcC DPH Admin **

name: Ray
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: This app is a hoax 😉 Update: I forgot that I wrote the above "review" until I got a response from the developer. I just want to say thank you for everything you are doing. This app is a great idea. Keep up the good work! I probably should have kept my original tongue in cheek "review" to myself.
developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthNovember 26, 2020John - Most scientific evidence does not come to the same conclusion. Thank you for your support ** SMcC DPH Admin **

name: Barbara M
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: I had no trouble downloading the app on my android, and it automatically activated notifications.
developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthNovember 25, 2020Barbara - Thank You ! **SMcC DPH App Admin **

name: Jeremy Webber
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: Install on my Pixel 4A was smooth and you can tell it's well designed and not a hacked together iOS port.

name: Mark Raymond
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: Error free install on Samsung galaxy with current OS. Looking forward to everyone doing their part.

name: David Cooper
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: Great app. Glad to see CT dept of health participating in this notification system. Be a patriot and wear a mask. It will save lives and prevent the need for further lock downs. No permissions needed. You have no excuse unless you hate your country.
developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthNovember 30, 2020David - Thank you for your support! ** SMcC DPH Admin **

name: Kenneth Langer
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: The exposure notification activation issue I reported in November seems to be resolved. Thanks!
developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthNovember 27, 2020Kenneth - We are actively working on resolving an issue identified with some Samsung phones. Thank you for participating. Please check back occasionally for an updated version. **SMcC DPH App Admin **

name: David T
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: Works fine. Hope I never get a ping about being near someone thats infected!
developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthNovember 25, 2020David T - Thank you for helping keep all of CT safer. **SMcC DPH App Admin **

name: Owen Spangler
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: Clean interface, and it seems to work well so far. Stop the spread!

name: Dan Loeb
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: Finally! Took the state forever to get a tracing app out, was looking for something like this months ago.
developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthNovember 25, 2020Dan - Thank you for participating. **SMcC DPH App Admin **

name: Kristen Soto
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: Easy to download and activate on my Samsung Galaxy device.

name: Martin Evans
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: Quick and easy to install.

name: Eric Throndson
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: I researched how this app works and I'm very comfortable with the way it protects privacy. I am curious though, if I'm around someone from another state that has their state's app and they get covid, will I get notified?
developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthNovember 26, 2020Eric - Yes, this is completely anonymous. It is all being coordinated though the APHL servers so If their App has you listed as being with in the proximity threshold (as defined by that state DPH), you will be notified when the positive test is reported in that state. **SMcC DPH App Admin **

name: Jill Stanley
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: I just downloaded the app I hope I like it and it helps to keep us safe or lets us know how to better besides disinfectant spray
developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthDecember 1, 2020Jill - Thank you for helping and doing your part ! ** SMcC DPH Admin **

name: Miles DeSantis
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: This is by all senses of the word a life saver. Thanks guys
developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthNovember 25, 2020Miles - Thank You **SMcC DPH App Admin **

name: Bobby Moniz
ratings: Rated 5 stars out of five stars
comment: I live in Taunton, MA & don't travel much. Is it OK to use this until Massachusetts releases one if at all? If it's useless unless I am in or near CT please let me know and I'll uninstall it.
developer_comment: CT Department of Public HealthDecember 1, 2020Bobby - This App will still work to tell you who you are close to, and be notified if someone else you are around from CT tests positive, but if YOU test positive the key can only be triggered by the CT Department of Public Health. As as a Mass resident we would not know your notification key. Thank you for your support. ** SMcC DPH Admin **
